summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an appropriation from the Transit Fund for the City's share of cost for preconstruction, design, trolley storage rental, maintenance parts and extra trolley car for the Waterfront Streetcar Project located along Alaskan Way between S. Washington St. and Broad St.; authorizing the execution of agreements with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle; authorizing the acceptance of financial assistance from the Urban Mass Transportation Administration; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts therefor.
